item.title: University of Rio Grande
item.description: Rio Grande is a combined community college and private university with a safe, empowering environment providing personal attention that makes it possible to push beyond expectations through an intimate, connected campus community, supportive professors who know students well enough to help them create an individualized college experience, the opportunity for everyone to participate in sports and extracurricular activities, and an excellent education at an affordable price.
